articles.author: Diego Colman
articles.title: Fed Keeps Rates Steady, Grows Cautious on Inflation; Gold, USD, Yields Await Powell - DailyFX
articles.description: The Federal Reserve held interest rates unchanged for the sixth consecutive meeting, in line with expectations. Powell may offer more clues about the policy outlook during his press conference.
articles.content:
FOMC DECISION APRIL 30- MAY 1 MEETING
  • The Fed holds interest rates steady at the end of its April 30-May 1 meeting, in line with expectations
  • Forward guidance in the FOMC statement r… [+3219 chars]

articles.title: Johnson & Johnson proposes $6.5bn deal to settle talc cancer lawsuits - Financial Times
articles.description: Drugmaker could fast track subsidiary’s bankruptcy process if 75% of claimants vote in favour of new plan
